banner.title: Connecting the Dots
banner.description1: The solutions are always about the realization of intelligent connections of people, systems and processes based on modern, robust technologies - safe, competent and always close to the specific customer needs: in partnership, together on site.
banner.description2: We are here for you. Our unique specialization in integration since our founding in 2000 with now +20 years of experience from +800 projects have made QUIBIQ the competence leader for connectivity and seamless integration on the Microsoft platform in Germany.

expertises.bizTalk: Point-to-point integration with Azure and BizTalk.
expertises.dotNet: Seamlessly integrated individual software based on .Net.
expertises.azure: Seamlessly integrated machine learning based on Azure ML.

owner.title: Story from Owner
owner.description: QUIBIQ was founded in Stuttgart in 2000. Around 40 software developers and architects are developing innovative solutions for today's networked business world here at the company's headquarters:  The Power of Integration - from application integration to the Internet of Things. The office - a converted warehouse in Stuttgart Vaihingen - also offers "best connections" in terms of location: On the outskirts of the city, not far from the center, with perfect transport connections to the airport - so we are always easy to reach; for our employees and customers alike.
